mapper.insert: insert into admin_user_role ( id, user_id, role_id, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime, user_type, merchant_id )values ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{roleId}, #{creator}, #{ctime}, #{modifier}, #{mtime}, #{userType}, #{merchantId} )
mapper.update:
update admin_user_role
id=#{id},
user_id=#{userId},
role_id=#{roleId},
creator=#{creator},
ctime=#{ctime},
modifier=#{modifier},
mtime=#{mtime},
user_type=#{userType},
merchant_id=#{merchantId},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, role_id, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime, user_type, merchant_id from admin_user_role where id=#{id}
select id, user_id, role_id, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime, user_type, merchant_id from admin_user_role where id=#{id}

select id, user_id, role_id, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime, user_type, merchant_id
limit #{offset},#{rows}
